title: Unable to start a game.
body: Originally I jumped into a ranked game and instantly I was presented with a crash right after joining, no bugsplat, just simply the game crashing and not loading, so I restarted my computer and the game had ended (most likely remake but I don't know, I'd just been promoted to Silver 3 so had 0 LP) But no I can't even join a custom lobby, I went into a custom lobby to make sure that it was working but it's not working at all. it doesn't even give me an error message now, I press reconnect, the window disappears as if it's about to take me in, nothing appears until the same reconnect screen appears. I'll try to do a Hextech repair tool for it but if not I am utterly confused. I'd rather not lose LP for random crashes. Thanks for reading :)

replies.body: That's pretty unsettling, and not an ideal way to start your new division but I'd like to help!  It sounds like your network is going into a dormant state and failing to transition you from champion select and to the game.  In this case, try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection to the game server.  Try again in a custom and let me know if it helps.
